attributes.title: Louis Suc
attributes.imdb: http://www.imdb.com/name/nm6653027/'''Louis Suc''' is a British child actor. He has appeared in the television series ''Mike the Knight''. He also played the lead role of Charlie Bucket in the West End musical ''Charlie and the Chocolate Factory.''In ''Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series'', he voices Ryon Forrester.==Credits==Telltale Game Series Credits
